name: Arcade Archives RYGAR
description:
'RYGAR' is a video game created by Tecmo in 1986 and originally released for arcades in Japan as 'Warrior of Argus'. It is a scrolling platform game where the player assumes the role as the 'Legendary Warrior'. The main
feature of gameplay is using a weapon called the 'Diskarmor'.
'Arcade archives' is faithfully reproduced in the masterpiece of the arcade game. Moreover, it corresponds to the function unique to PlayStation®4 system called a SHARE function.
Please enjoy the masterpiece of the video game.



1-2 players
DUALSHOCK®4
1080p HD Video Output
